rest_0.name: Mix Tandoori Grill
rest_0.description: The perfect selection, consisting of chicken wings, seekh kebab, lamb chops, chicken tikka, and lamb tikka.

rest_1.name: Fried chicken
rest_1.description: Chicken tossed in Sam’s secret special breading, simply wonderful.

rest_1.name: Chicken nuggets (box of 5)
rest_1.description: Chicken nuggets tossed in Sam’s secret special breading, simply wonderful.

rest_1.name: BBQ wings (4 pieces)
rest_1.description: Chicken wings cooked with our secret recipe

rest_2.name: Dutch Apple Cheesecake
rest_2.description: The famous classic cheesecake with homemade baked apples, caramel and brown sugar cinnamon streusel on a graham cracker crumb.

rest_2.name: Red Velvet Cheesecake
rest_2.description: Red Velvet cake and a creamy classic cheesecake, layered with rich cream cheese icing, and finished with white chocolate curls

rest_3.name: Traditional Winter Melon
rest_3.description: Winter melon beverage made according to a traditional Taiwanese recipe. This is a caffeine- free drink with fixed sweetness.

rest_3.name: MissMe Milk - Warm/Hot
rest_3.description: Fresh Milk with Sweet Red Bean. A classic caffeinated beverage made with fresh cow's milk and coarsely mashed red bean. The deep and sweet flavour of our red beans is truly delightful.

rest_3.name: Yakult Iced Tea
rest_3.description: Classic Yakult drink with our fragrant green tea. It carries a mixed flavour of citrus and vanilla, which will become your new addiction.

rest_3.name: Mudflip Milk Tea
rest_3.description: Our take on the classic “Bubble Milk Tea”. We use the bigger ‘boba’ tapioca pearls which are cooked everyday with the premium brown sugar from Taiwan.
